events.message: I recently received my order but want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue has been reviewed and classified under the refund category for further processing.
A support agent has been assigned to handle your refund request and will assist you shortly.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you'd like to process a refund for your recent purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and details about why you are requesting a refund?
My order number is 123456789. The product arrived late and was missing some parts, which is why I want my money back.
We apologize for the inconvenience. I can initiate a full refund for you immediately and provide a prepaid return label.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the refund offer and will send back the product as soon as I get the label.
Your refund has been processed and the return label sent to your email. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
We are following up to ensure that you received the return label and that your refund process is going smoothly.
As your refund has been completed successfully and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case now.
Please take a moment to fill out this satisfaction survey to help us improve our services.
